main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky for about 1.5 hours, exhibiting unusual characteristics.
interesting points: The object appeared to be surrounded by a haze or glow and was illuminated, with the color varying from white to reddish-orange.
The object seemed to be metallic in appearance and had no visible means of propulsion, and no sound could be heard.
At times, the object appeared to cast a shadow on the ground and was estimated to be around 30-40 feet in diameter at an altitude of 3,000 feet.
The object would appear, disappear, reappear, move around, and remain stationary at times.
The observers had no explanation for what they observed and hoped the report would help determine what the object was.
sighted object: an illuminated, metallic-appearing object with no visible means of propulsion
